result.execSummary:
The defendant Kirk John Holtz was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Possess Drug Paraphernalia, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 961.573(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: $50 month payment plan to commence 12/1/15. $15 payment plan fee to be added

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Kirk John Holtz

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Kirk John Holtz in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Atty Hendee states plea agreement.  Defendant agrees.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Court questions defendant and finds his waiver of counsel is being made freely, voluntarily & intelligently.  
Defendant enters Guilty plea.  Court questions defendant regarding plea. Advises of Constitutional Rights and elements of the charge.  Court finds plea made knowingly, voluntarily & Intelligently.  Court relies on the criminal complaint for a factual basis.  BY THE COURT:  Court finds a sufficient factual basis to support the charges.  Court accepts defendant's plea and finds the defendant guilty.

BY THE COURT:  Court orders defendant to pay costs of $243.00.
Payment Plan:  $50/month, commencing 12/1/15 and the $15 payment plan fee.

Pre-trial conference at 09-08-2015 10:45 am.
Return date at 10-27-2015 03:30 pm.

Defendant Kirk John Holtz in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant received a copy of the criminal complaint & waives it's reading.  Court advises defendant of right to an attorney.  Defendant understands.  Defendant confirms his address.
  Atty Hendee has no objection to a signature bond with conditions.  Atty Hendee states that the defendant has been booked already.
  
BY THE COURT:  Court sets a $500 Signature bond with conditions.
Court finds probable cause.

  BY THE COURT:  Court enters a Not Guilty plea on behalf of the defendant.

Court questions the defendant.    Defendant waives their right to an attorney in order to have a conference with the District Attorney.
BY THE COURT:  Set for Return and Pre-Trial.

  Return date scheduled for October 27, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 8, 2015 at 10:45 am.
New address given per MASO.  Cancel warrant and reset.  smr

ADDRESS INFO for Kirk John Holtz
Current: 618 Royal Park Rd, Racine, WI 53402 United States  (Effective: 08-17-2015)
Prior: W8086 Fawn Av, Oxford, WI 53952

Signed by Judge for FTA 08-13-15 and filed w/Clerk
cc:  DA, MASO & Defendant - ja

Defendant Kirk John Holtz not in court.  Chad A. Hendee appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Atty Hendee states that this was an unserved summons that was sent to the last known address; based on that the State requests warrant.  

BY THE COURT:  Warrant will issue.
